thread.section_title: TransferWise Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of transferwise.com | 27 of 1820
thread.title: JC

author: JC
title: JC
text: I was recommended to pay through Travelwise for a couple of dive trips abroad - much cheaper fees! First time round, step 5 didn't load up but online support were great, immediately on hand and talked me through it very quickly and easily :) Second payment I tried to make the next day, my bank had blocked my account (because of the first transaction...make sure you contact your bank so subsequent payments are not blocked!!!) so I had to put my transfer process on hold another day. While I could easily pick up the transaction so far, there was no 'warning'/recalculation that the rate had changed before I hit 'send' which meant I ended up sending just short of what was required! If you don't complete a transaction in the same day, remember to check the rate or simply redo the transfer so you send what you mean to send! I would also now like to see you can send/transfer from Thai baht :)
